Are you looking for an apartment that will be comfortable for everyday use, well-thought-out, and located in a place where you really want to live? This 3-room apartment with an area of 55.34 m? on the 3rd floor of a modern building in the Podedworze 13 estate is a great choice ? both for a family and for people who value space, privacy and a quiet environment without giving up the convenience of the city. The most important advantages Functional layout - 3 independent rooms, fully adapted to family life, remote work or arranging a room for a toddler Balcony - the perfect place for morning coffee or a break after work District heating - comfort and lower operating costs New construction - EKOPARK investment, known for quality and attention to detail Elevator, monitoring, one-key system - convenience and security that are standard today, but here it is clear that someone has thought about it The interior is bright, spacious and ready to be decorated exactly as you like. No compromises, no wasted meters ? here every centimeter makes sense. Podedworze 13 Development ? Comfort, Space, and Tranquility. The development comprises two modern buildings with a spacious, green patio between them. It exudes a peaceful, orderly atmosphere where everything flows smoothly. Residents can expect: a green patio with a relaxation area and comfortable loungers pergola perfect for summer evenings safe playground underground garages and above-ground spaces bicycle and stroller storage possibility of installing a charger for an electric car There are no compromises here ? everything is designed with functionality and comfort in mind. Location - quiet, yet close to everyday needs. The apartment is located in a place that combines peace and quiet with access to city amenities. In the area you will find: shops and service points schools, kindergartens, nurseries public transport green areas ideal for walking or jogging You live in the city, but you relax like you're in the suburbs. That's how it should be. For whom? ? family with a child ? a couple with plans for the future ? an investor who values modern, sought-after spaces NOTE: I also have other apartments in this development ? from 34 to 90 m? , in various layouts and on different floors. If you have specific expectations, I will select a venue that perfectly meets your needs. It's the perfect starting point for a single person or a couple. Main advantages of the apartment: Well-thought-out layout: Despite its compact size, the apartment offers two separate rooms, allowing for convenient arrangement of living and working space. District heating: Provides thermal comfort and convenience as well as lower operating costs. High standard: The apartment is part of an investment that focuses on quality workmanship, elegant architecture and high-quality materials. Additional space: The apartment includes a spacious balcony , perfect for relaxing outdoors. Why is it worth living in Destino? Location: The development is located at the intersection of three districts ? Krowodrza, Wola Justowska, and Bronowice Stare . Nearby, you have access to Targ Rydla , Galeria Bronowice , IKEA , and numerous service outlets. Close to nature: Live in the MaÅ‚e BÅ‚onia area in Bronowice . Within easy reach are the BÅ‚onia Krakowskie , the Rudawa River, and the Wolski Forest . Modern amenities: Residents can use underground garages , monitoring and silent elevators . Destino ? Intimate City Villas in Serdeczne Bronowice Destino is a unique development offering the perfect balance between city life and relaxation in the bosom of nature. These intimate, multi-family urban villas, located at the intersection of three Krakow districts: Krowodrza, Wola Justowska, and Bronowice Stare, are synonymous with tranquility and high standards. Unique Location and Closeness to Nature The location on Odlewnicza and BakaÅ‚arzy streets is one of the development's greatest advantages. Destino apartments are located in the MaÅ‚e BÅ‚onia area in Bronowice, providing residents with direct access to greenery. This is an ideal place for those who value peace and nature without sacrificing proximity to the rhythm of city life. There are numerous recreational areas within easy reach: BÅ‚onia Krakowskie (6 minutes by bike) ? 42 ha of greenery, perfect for jogging, walking or rollerblading. The Rudawa River ? a few steps from the investment, perfect for afternoon walks. Wolski Forest and Decius Park ? a vast area ideal for active recreation. MÅ‚ynÃ³wka KrÃ³lewska Park and Henryk Jordan Park ? offering playgrounds, recreational areas and walking paths. High Standard and Modern Apartments Destino offers not only a great location but also attention to every detail. The development comprises five two-story, low-rise buildings with just 90 apartments. This ensures the development's intimate and peaceful character. Size: Apartments available from 40 to 110 m?, in 2-, 3- and 4-room layouts. Additional space: Each ground floor apartment has a large garden (up to 80 m?), and each upper floor apartment has a spacious balcony. Finishing: The buildings are characterized by subdued and elegant architecture. Clinker tile facades and glass balustrades emphasize the prestigious nature of the development. Amenities and Technology The development prioritizes comfort and safety. Residents can count on a range of modern amenities: Independent underground garages and outdoor parking spaces. Quiet elevators in every staircase. Monitoring of common areas, video intercoms and burglar-proof doors. Electric car charging stations and bicycle racks. Przedstawiona oferta ma charakter informacyjny i nie stanowi oferty w rozumieniu art. 66 Â§ 1 Kodeksu cywilnego I'm presenting a functional, 2-room apartment with an area of 37.45 m? , located on the 4th floor of a modern, six-story building. It's an ideal choice for singles, couples, and long-term rentals. Main advantages of the apartment: Well-thought-out layout: Despite its compact size, the apartment has two separate rooms, ensuring comfort and privacy. District heating: Guarantees comfort and lower operating costs. High standard: The apartment is part of an investment that stands out for its high-quality materials and modern finish. Additional space: The apartment includes a balcony , perfect for relaxing outdoors. Why is it worth living in Forma Otwarta? Location: The estate is located between Sosnowiecka and MiÄ™sowicza streets, providing easy access to Galeria Bronowice, IKEA, Makro and numerous service points. Closeness to nature: Within the development you will find an oak alley , themed gardens, relaxation areas and even an outdoor gym, which will allow you to take a break from the hustle and bustle of the city. Excellent transport links: The location provides efficient access to the city center and a quick exit to the ring road, which will be appreciated by both drivers and people using public transport. Security: The estate is monitored and the buildings are equipped with video intercoms, guaranteeing peace and a sense of security. Forma Otwarta is a new, prestigious investment by developer EKOPARK in the heart of Krakow's fashionable Bronowice Wielkie district . Located between Sosnowiecka and MiÄ™sowicza streets, the development offers the perfect balance between dynamic city life and the tranquility and proximity of nature. It's a place where high living comfort is combined with exceptional aesthetics and functionality. Modern Space and Greenery in the Heart of the Estate The development consists of four buildings, and their architecture and spatial development are designed with residents' comfort in mind. A distinctive feature of the development is the oak avenue that runs through its center, guaranteeing greenery and unforgettable views. The investment area is also planned to include: Thematic gardens such as flower meadows, fruit bushes and herbs. Relaxation areas, playground and outdoor gym. Insect houses that support the local ecosystem. The apartment selection is diverse. Available units range from 2, 3, and 4 rooms, ranging in size from 37 to 130 m? . Each apartment has additional space in the form of a balcony, terrace (up to 130 m?), or green garden (up to 261 m?). Location and Full Infrastructure at Your Fingertips The location of the estate in KrakÃ³w-Bronowice provides easy access to extensive commercial and service infrastructure and key points of the city: Within walking distance (up to 10 minutes): Galeria Bronowice, grocery stores (Biedronka, Å»abka), medical centers, pharmacy, Polish Post Office and parcel lockers. Within reach by car (up to 5 minutes): IKEA, Makro, Lidl, OBI, Castorama, as well as the Futura Park shopping center. Education: There are as many as 20 kindergartens and 14 primary schools nearby. Excellent transport links (Opolska Street) ensure efficient access to the city center and, in the future, to the ring road. Higher Standard of Finishing and Amenities Forma Otwarta is a development that prioritizes quality and comfort. Residents can count on a range of amenities that make everyday life easier: Public parking spaces and underground garages. Video intercoms and monitoring of common areas. Cycling and bike racks. Aluminum windows, LED lighting, storage units. The investment is being carried out in two stages: stage A is already ready for handover, and stage B will be completed in the fourth quarter of 2025. Please contact me by phone: and arrange a presentation. The presented offer is for information purposes only and does not constitute an offer within the meaning of Article 66 Â§ 1 of the Civil Code. Modern Apartments in Krakow with Access to Nature. Bunscha Residence is the perfect place for those seeking a modern and comfortable apartment in Krakow, while also valuing proximity to greenery and full infrastructure. This intimate Inter-Bud development, located on Karola Bunscha Street, combines urban convenience with relaxation in the bosom of nature. Location and Infrastructure at Your Fingertips: Living in the Bunscha Residence development in Krakow guarantees access to everything you need every day. The development is adjacent to the ATUT Shopping Center, which offers a wide range of services and shops, including: two large-scale grocery stores, DIY store, electronics stores, clothing stores and drugstores, My Fitness Place fitness club and HalaMAKI Food Hall with restaurants serving cuisines from around the world. In the immediate vicinity, you'll also find an Orlen gas station, KFC, and the popular Trzy Kaczki restaurant. A parcel locker is also planned, making everyday life even easier for residents. Modern Architecture and Living Space: The Bunscha Residence project comprises five five-story buildings, designed with attention to every detail. A wide selection of apartments ranging from 31 to 94 square meters are available, catering to the needs of singles, couples, and families. Ground-floor apartments feature spacious gardens, while upper-floor apartments feature large balconies, perfect for enjoying morning coffee. This is also an excellent investment for rentals in Krakow, thanks to its attractive location and comprehensive serviced amenities. As part of the investment, a commercial part has already been built on the ground floor of the buildings, where the MARKET POINT food delicatessen and the Flario restaurant operate. Relaxation and Outdoor Activity Zone. What sets Bunscha Residence apart is its carefully designed common space. Residents will have access to: a graduation tower that promotes relaxation and health, pedestrian and bicycle routes, a modern playground, well-thought-out pergolas and rich plantings of trees and shrubs, creating a green and friendly environment. Additionally, near the investment there is an extensive park and hospital complex (52 ha), ideal for walking and recreation, as well as popular green areas such as ZakrzÃ³wek and PodgÃ³rki Tynieckie. Excellent Communication and Amenities: Bunscha Residence is the perfect solution for those who value mobility. Its proximity to the tram and bus terminus and Park & Ride parking lot provides quick connections to every part of Krakow. Drivers will appreciate the easy access to Krakow's southern bypass and the A4 motorway. Each apartment is equipped with municipal central heating (MPEC), ensuring thermal comfort. Residents have access to an elevator, video intercom, underground parking spaces, and storage units. The investment is scheduled to be commissioned in the fourth quarter of 2026.
